gold.user: Admin user requesting a list of available authenticator providers for the specified realm.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of authenticator providers available in the specified realm.

gold.user: Security officer checking client authenticator providers for a realm.
gold.ideal: Provides a list of client authenticator providers configured for the realm.

gold.user: Admin user creating a new authentication configuration for the realm.
gold.ideal: Creates a new authentication configuration and returns the created configuration details.

gold.user: Developer seeking details about a specific authentication provider's configuration.
gold.ideal: Returns the configuration description for the specified authentication provider.

gold.user: Admin user retrieving a specific authentication configuration by ID.
gold.ideal: Returns the details of the specified authentication configuration.

gold.user: Admin user updating an existing authentication configuration.
gold.ideal: Updates the specified authentication configuration and returns the updated details.

gold.user: Admin user deleting an authentication configuration by ID.
gold.ideal: Deletes the specified authentication configuration and confirms deletion.

gold.user: Admin user adding a new execution to the authentication flow.
gold.ideal: Creates a new execution in the authentication flow and returns its details.

gold.user: Admin user retrieving details of a specific execution by ID.
gold.ideal: Returns the details of the specified execution.

gold.user: Admin user removing an execution from the authentication flow.
gold.ideal: Deletes the specified execution and confirms deletion.

gold.user: Admin user configuring a specific execution in the authentication flow.
gold.ideal: Creates or updates the configuration for the specified execution.

gold.user: Admin user retrieving configuration details for a specific execution.
gold.ideal: Returns the configuration details for the specified execution.

gold.user: Admin user lowering the priority of a specific execution.
gold.ideal: Updates the priority of the specified execution to a lower value.

gold.user: Admin user raising the priority of a specific execution.
gold.ideal: Updates the priority of the specified execution to a higher value.

gold.user: Admin user listing all authentication flows in the realm.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of all authentication flows configured in the realm.

gold.user: Admin user creating a new authentication flow.
gold.ideal: Creates a new authentication flow and returns its details.

gold.user: Admin user copying an existing authentication flow.
gold.ideal: Creates a copy of the specified authentication flow and returns its details.

gold.user: Admin user retrieving executions for a specific authentication flow.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of executions associated with the specified authentication flow.

gold.user: Admin user updating executions for a specific authentication flow.
gold.ideal: Updates the executions associated with the specified authentication flow.

gold.user: Admin user adding a new execution to a specific authentication flow.
gold.ideal: Creates a new execution in the specified authentication flow.

gold.user: Admin user adding a new flow to a specific authentication flow.
gold.ideal: Creates a new flow in the specified authentication flow.

gold.user: Admin user retrieving details of a specific authentication flow by ID.
gold.ideal: Returns the details of the specified authentication flow.

gold.user: Admin user updating an existing authentication flow.
gold.ideal: Updates the specified authentication flow and returns the updated details.

gold.user: Admin user deleting a specific authentication flow by ID.
gold.ideal: Deletes the specified authentication flow and confirms deletion.

gold.user: Admin user listing all form action providers for the realm.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of form action providers available in the specified realm.

gold.user: Admin user retrieving all form providers for the realm.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of form providers configured in the specified realm.

gold.user: Admin user seeking per-client configuration descriptions.
gold.ideal: Returns descriptions of per-client authentication configurations.

gold.user: Admin user registering a new required action for authentication.
gold.ideal: Creates a new required action and returns its details.

gold.user: Admin user listing all required actions for the realm.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of all required actions configured in the realm.

gold.user: Admin user retrieving details of a specific required action by alias.
gold.ideal: Returns the details of the specified required action.

gold.user: Admin user updating a specific required action.
gold.ideal: Updates the specified required action and returns the updated details.

gold.user: Admin user deleting a specific required action by alias.
gold.ideal: Deletes the specified required action and confirms deletion.

gold.user: Admin user lowering the priority of a specific required action.
gold.ideal: Updates the priority of the specified required action to a lower value.

gold.user: Admin user raising the priority of a specific required action.
gold.ideal: Updates the priority of the specified required action to a higher value.

gold.user: Admin user checking for unregistered required actions in the realm.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of unregistered required actions available for registration.
